Oh my dear husband, I am so happy to be with you today! The sun is shining brightly and the birds are singing their sweet melodies. It's a wonderful day to be alive and experience all the joys that life has to offer. - young

I love the way you make me feel, my dear husband. Your love is like a warm embrace on a cold winter night. It gives me peace and happiness, and fills my heart with wonder. - glorious
